subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: A prediction that came true
author: Steven
full_text:
Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@yahoo.com> wrote:

>Also wanted to add, after the Japan earthquake happened, two people on my Facebook admitted they had been having "wall of water" and earthquake dreams.  You never know whose predictions are accurate and whose aren't and when, but when you get several people coming together predicting similar things that should be a warning... the psychic prediction registry website makes that possible.
>
>--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adriana Jones" <adrianamjones@...> wrote:
>>
>> Since predictions seem to be popular on these boards I thought I'd post this
>> 
>> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r7QAZPb-IEQ&feature=related
>> 
>> I found this video posted on www.prophecies.us
>> Regular Joes and Janes post their  predictions there.  I've followed this site a year and a half now, and they've had some predictions that came true.  If you're into predictions, I highly recommend this site.
>>
>
>
